profiles_info.name: Human Design Profiles
profiles_info.description: The 12 Profile combinations representing life themes and roles
profiles_info.purpose: Profiles describe how you interact with the world and your life theme
profiles_info.source: Human Design System by Ra Uru Hu

1.name: The Investigator
1.description: Needs to investigate and understand foundations before feeling secure

2.name: The Hermit
2.description: Has natural talents that need to be called out by others
2.shadow: Hiding talents or being called for wrong things

3.name: The Martyr
3.description: Learns through experimentation and trial and error

4.name: The Opportunist
4.description: Success comes through network and relationships

5.name: The Heretic
5.description: Projected upon to provide solutions, often misunderstood

6.name: The Role Model
6.description: Lives in three distinct phases: experimentation, withdrawal, and wisdom

phases.phase_1: Birth to Saturn Return (~30): Experimentation like a 3rd line
phases.phase_2: 30 to Chiron Return (~50): Withdrawal and observation
phases.phase_3: 50+: Wisdom and role model for others

1_3.name: 1/3 - Investigator/Martyr
1_3.description: Needs to investigate and understand foundations, then test them through experimentation
1_3.conscious: Investigator - needs to study and understand
1_3.unconscious: Martyr - learns through trial and error
1_3.life_purpose: To build solid foundations through experimentation and learning
1_3.relationships: Bonds through shared learning experiences and mutual investigation

1_4.name: 1/4 - Investigator/Opportunist
1_4.description: Builds solid foundations and shares knowledge through network and relationships
1_4.conscious: Investigator - needs to study and understand
1_4.life_purpose: To research and share knowledge through influential networks
challenges: Balancing study time with social time
1_4.relationships: Forms deep friendships based on shared interests and mutual learning

2_4.name: 2/4 - Hermit/Opportunist
2_4.description: Has natural talents that are called out and shared through network
2_4.conscious: Hermit - natural talent that needs calling
2_4.life_purpose: To develop natural gifts and share them through relationships
2_4.relationships: Network calls out their talents and provides opportunities for expression

2_5.name: 2/5 - Hermit/Heretic
2_5.description: Natural talents are projected upon to solve universal problems
2_5.conscious: Hermit - natural talent that needs calling
2_5.life_purpose: To provide universal solutions through natural talents
2_5.relationships: Others project solutions onto them, need to manage projections carefully

3_5.name: 3/5 - Martyr/Heretic
3_5.description: Learns through experimentation and provides practical solutions to others
3_5.conscious: Martyr - learns through trial and error
3_5.life_purpose: To discover what works through experimentation and share practical solutions
3_5.relationships: Bonds through shared experiences, others seek their practical solutions

3_6.name: 3/6 - Martyr/Role Model
3_6.description: Experiments in first phase, withdraws to observe, then becomes wise role model
3_6.conscious: Martyr - learns through trial and error
3_6.life_purpose: To gain wisdom through experience and become authentic role model

life_phases.phase_1: Birth to ~30: Heavy experimentation and trial/error like 3/3
life_phases.phase_2: 30 to ~50: Withdrawal and observation, learning from mistakes
life_phases.phase_3: 50+: Wise role model sharing authentic wisdom

challenges: Pressure to be perfect role model
3_6.relationships: Early bonds through shared experiences, later becomes wise guide for others

4_6.name: 4/6 - Opportunist/Role Model
4_6.description: Builds influential network, then becomes wise role model for community
4_6.life_purpose: To influence through network and become wise role model

life_phases.phase_1: Birth to ~30: Building network and experimenting with influence
life_phases.phase_2: 30 to ~50: Selective with network, observing and learning
life_phases.phase_3: 50+: Wise role model with influential authority

4_6.relationships: Deep friendships that evolve into wise mentoring relationships

4_1.name: 4/1 - Opportunist/Investigator
4_1.description: Builds network and influence based on solid foundations and knowledge
4_1.life_purpose: To influence others through network based on solid knowledge foundation
challenges: Need for foundation vs social demands
4_1.relationships: Forms friendships based on shared knowledge and mutual foundation-building

5_1.name: 5/1 - Heretic/Investigator
5_1.description: Provides universal solutions based on solid research and investigation
5_1.relationships: Others seek their well-researched solutions and expertise

5_2.name: 5/2 - Heretic/Hermit
5_2.description: Natural talent for providing universal solutions, needs to be called out
5_2.life_purpose: To provide natural universal solutions when properly called
5_2.relationships: Must be properly called out for their natural solution-providing abilities

6_2.name: 6/2 - Role Model/Hermit
6_2.description: Natural wisdom that develops through three life phases to become authentic role model
6_2.life_purpose: To develop natural wisdom and become authentic role model

life_phases.phase_1: Birth to ~30: Experimenting with natural gifts like 2/2
life_phases.phase_2: 30 to ~50: Withdrawal to develop natural wisdom
life_phases.phase_3: 50+: Called out as wise role model

6_2.relationships: Must be properly called out for their natural wisdom and role model qualities

6_3.name: 6/3 - Role Model/Martyr
6_3.description: Gains wisdom through experimentation and becomes role model for resilience
6_3.unconscious: Martyr - learns through trial and error
6_3.life_purpose: To gain wisdom through experimentation and model resilience

life_phases.phase_3: 50+: Role model for resilience and wisdom

characteristics: Models how to learn from mistakes
challenges: Pressure to be perfect despite mistakes
6_3.relationships: Bonds through shared experiences, later becomes wise guide for others' experiments
